    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreatePersonByUsername

        Person getOrCreatePersonByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                                   throws DaoException
        Return person with the given username if exists. Create new one otherwise. Username is unique.
        Parameters:
        username - Uniwue username of person
        Returns:
        person with given username or created person with setted id
        Throws:
        DaoException
